Proxy.label: Unstructured NetCDF POP reader
Proxy.name: UnstructuredPOPReaderCore

Documentation.long_help: Reads rectilinear grid data from a NetCDF POP file and converts it into unstructured data.
Documentation.short_help: Read rectlinear grid data from a NetCDF file in the POP format and converts it into unstructured data.

Proxy.Documentation: The reader reads regular rectilinear grid (image/volume) data from a NetCDF file and turns it into an unstructured spherical grid.

StringVectorProperty.name: FileName
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: This property specifies the file name to read.

IntVectorProperty.name: Stride
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: This property indicate the number of indices per dimension (i,j,k) to skip between each point included in this output.

IntVectorProperty.label: VOI
IntVectorProperty.name: VOI
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: The data volume of interest (VOI). The VOI is a sub-extent of the data that you want loaded. Setting a VOI is useful when reading from a large data set and you are only interested in a small portion of the data. If left containing all 0's, then the reader will load in the entire data set.

IntVectorProperty.label: VerticalVelocity
IntVectorProperty.name: VerticalVelocity
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: If there is a velocity vector with only 2 components, specify that the reader should compute the third component.

SourceProxy.label: Phasta Reader
SourceProxy.name: PhastaReader

Documentation.long_help: Reads the parallel Phasta meta-file and the underlying Phasta files.
Documentation.short_help: Read datasets stored in the Phasta format.

SourceProxy.Documentation: This Phasta reader reads files stored in the Phasta (a CFD package) format. The expected file extension is .pht. The output of this reader is a multipiece data set.

StringVectorProperty.name: FileName
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: This property specifies the file name for the Phasta reader.

SourceProxy.label: Unstructured NetCDF POP reader
SourceProxy.name: UnstructuredPOPReader

Documentation.long_help: Reads rectilinear grid data from a NetCDF POP file and converts it into unstructured data.
Documentation.short_help: Read rectlinear grid data from a NetCDF file in the POP format and converts it into unstructured data.

SourceProxy.Documentation: The reader reads regular rectilinear grid (image/volume) data from a NetCDF file and turns it into an unstructured spherical grid.

StringVectorProperty.name: FileName
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: The list of files to be read by the reader.

SourceProxy.label: VRML Reader
SourceProxy.name: vrmlreader

Documentation.long_help: Load the geometry from a VRML 2.0 file.

SourceProxy.Documentation: The VRML reader loads only the geometry from a VRML (Virtual Reality Modeling Language) 2.0 file. The expected file extension is .wrl. The output of this reader is a polygonal dataset.

StringVectorProperty.name: FileName
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: This property specifies the file name for the VRML reader.

EnsembleDataReaderProxy.label: Ensemble Data Reader
EnsembleDataReaderProxy.name: EnsembleDataReader

Documentation.long_help: Reads ensemble data organized in CSV files.

EnsembleDataReaderProxy.Documentation: Reads CSV files in which each row gives a dataset and the last column of each row specifies the file name for the dataset. The standard extension is .pve.

StringVectorProperty.name: FileName
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: This property specifies the PVE file name

IntVectorProperty.name: CurrentEnsembleMember
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: The index of the dataset in the ensemble.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: TimestepValues
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: Reports time values to the GUI.
